Header: DIG Nalaka de Silva and Namal Kumara ordered to appear before court
Content: DIG Nalaka de Silva and the Director (Operations) of the Anti-Corruption Force Namal Kumara have been ordered to appear before the Colombo Fort Magistrateâ€™s Court on Monday the08th. The order was issued by the court when the case filed with regard to the ongoing investigation into the alleged assassination plot targeting President Maithripala Sirisena and former Defense Secretary Gotabaya Rajapaksa, was taken up today. The Criminal Investigations Department informed the court that the voice test related to the incident has been completed. The Magistrate said that the related order would be issued on the 08th of this month.
